label: Muadsub, Sopita & Nantasak Pinkaew.  2021. Three new species of Loboschiza Diakonoff, 1968 (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae: Olethreutinae) with redescriptions of L. mediana (Walker, 1864)  and L. martia (Meyrick, 1911), two new records from Thailand. Zootaxa 5047(1): 68-80.
